pullRequest.title: [#1679] Update JavaDoc of the Device Management APIs for status codes
pullRequest.bodyText: The JavaDoc of the device management interface has been fixed now with the missing response codes to make it sync with that of the API definition in https://www.eclipse.org/hono/docs/api/management/.

nodes.bodyText:
IMHO we shouldn't list the possible status codes here at all but instead simply refer to the Device Registry Management API docs ...
@ctron @dejanb WDYT?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -42,6 +42,9 @@ * @return A future indicating the outcome of the operation. The status will be *
    *
  • 201 Created if the device has been registered successfully.
    • + *
  • 400 Bad Request if the request to register the device is malformed.
    • + *
  • 401 Unauthorized if the authentication credentials are required, but missing.
    • + *
  • 403 Forbidden if the operation to register the device is not allowed.

commit.message:
[#1679] Update JavaDoc of the device management APIs with the information on status codes.

Signed-off-by: Kartheeswaran Kalidass <kartheeswaran.kalidass@bosch.io>

beforeCommit.message:
[#1679] Fix JavaDoc of the device management interface with the missing response codes to make it sync with that of the API definition in https://www.eclipse.org/hono/docs/api/management/.

Signed-off-by: Kartheeswaran Kalidass <kartheeswaran.kalidass@bosch.io>

afterCommit.message:
[#1679] Update JavaDoc of the device management APIs with the information on status codes.

Signed-off-by: Kartheeswaran Kalidass <kartheeswaran.kalidass@bosch.io>
